tutorial_talks.content: {DESI}! There's been a change in the Roaming Warriors, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Now you can summon aid from another world twice in one dungeon, even if you and the other keeper aren't following each other!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: That, and you can follow 100 keepers, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: There's more, kupo! Instead of just sending your Leader, now you can send any Roaming Warrior you choose!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: But wait, what's a Roaming Warrior?
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi

tutorial_talks.content: A Roaming Warrior is a character you pick on your Profile. They don't even have to be in your Party!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Oh, and you can even equip the character you choose with things your other characters have equipped, kupo! Easy!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: I get it! So I can pick a character to send out Roaming without worrying about my own Party at all!
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_laugh

tutorial_talks.content: But be aware that without a Leader, you won't be starting off with a full Soul Break gauge either, kupo.
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: But it's not all bad news! If your Roaming Warrior gets summoned, you get paid in gil, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Wait, does that mean I have to pay gil when I summon someone else's character?
tutorial_talks.speaker: deshi_surprise

tutorial_talks.content: Nope! You don't have to pay a single gil, kupo!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle

tutorial_talks.content: Now, get back to rescuing Records, and don't be afraid to call on your Roaming friends!
tutorial_talks.speaker: moogle
